name: HordeGame
description:
Getting started System requirments (recommended)
  • OS: Windows 10
  • RAM: 4GB
  • Graphics Card: Geforce GTX 960
Instructions
  • One of the party has to be the host
  • If all of the people in the party die game is over
  • If one of you survives to the next wave the other will respawn
Controls
  • Move forward with: W,I,UpArrow.
  • Move Backwards with: S,K, DownArrow.
  • Move Right with: D,L,RightArrow.
  • Move Left with: A,J,LeftArrow.
  • Reload with: R,P.
  • Crouch with: C,N.
  • Fire with: Left botton mouse.
  • Zoom with: Right botton mouse.
